node.name: EVENTIFY
node.description: A platform for young and aspiring programmers to keep track of any programming contest, hackathon, job opportunities etc. People can also add any any event if they want.

node.name: SPORTS-VILLA
node.description: A platform where users can find content and news related to their favorite sports. Users can also see content related to a specific sport or event.

node.name: MONEY-TRACKER
node.description: An advanced voice powered application, which can be used to keep track of all your incomes and expenses. It also provides a graphical representation of all your transactions.

node.name: GOOGLE-SEARCH-CLONE
node.description: A Google Search Clone, where users can find all the content including news, photos, videos of anything they type. It also has an added functionality of Dark Mode.
